content: say hello to the perfect everyday sweater the v-neck cardigan is knitted in caron simply soft you will also need 3 st holders and 5 buttons for this project to fit bust/chest measurement extra-small/small 28-34 71-86 5 cm medium 36-38 91 5-96 5 cm large 40-42 101 5-106 5 cm extra-large 44-46 112-117 cm 2/3 x-large 48-54 122-137 cm 4/5 x-large 56-62 142-157 5 cm finished bust/chest extra-small/small 37 94 cm medium 40½ 103 cm large 44½ 113 cm extra-large 49 124 5 cm 2/3 x-large 55 140 cm 4/5 x-large 63 160 cm
